job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field

jd: From: Vikrama, Valiantiq vrao@valiantiq.com Reply to: vrao@valiantiq.com Job Title: Product AnalystClient: Con EdisonContract: 7 monthsLocation: New York, NY (Hybrid)Experience: 8+ yearsVisa: No visa restrictions Candidate must be LOCAL to NY/NJ Position Overview:Proactive and detail-oriented Product Analyst (Agile Business Analyst) to join our dynamic team.The ideal candidate will bridge the gap between business needs and technical solutions, ensuring that our agile E-mobility incentive projects align with business goals and deliver maximum value. Responsibilities:Requirements Documentation: Collaborate with stakeholders to assist in gathering and own documenting business requirements, ensuring clarity and completeness.User Stories: Create and refine user stories, acceptance criteria, and ensure they are well-understood by the development teamAgile Facilitation: Support agile ceremonies, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, reviews, and retrospectivesBacklog Management: Assist in prioritizing the product backlog, ensuring alignment with business objectives and stakeholder needsProcess Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvements and recommend solutions to enhance efficiency and productivityStakeholder Communication: Act as a liaison between business stakeholders and the development team, facilitating effective communication and collaborationData Analysis: Analyze data to provide insights and support decision-making processesQuality Assurance: Assist in defining and executing test plans to ensure deliverables meet quality standards and business requirements Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field3+ years of experience as a Product Analyst/Business Analyst/Scrum Master in an agile environmentStrong understanding of agile methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban)Excellent communication and interpersonal skillsProficiency in agile tools (e.g., Azure DevOps)Strong analytical and problem-solving abilitiesAbility to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment Required Skills: Experience with data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)Certification in Agile methodologies (e.g., Certified Scrum Master, PMI-ACP)Knowledge of software development lifecycle (SDLC)Knowledge of E-mobility and electric vehicle charger programs a plusPotential to extend.Agile Product ManagementDevelop and maintains dynamic product roadmapDevelop Power BI dashboardsExperience supporting a PO with product analysis, feature breakdown and prioritizationAgile and DevOps best practicesAgile Project Manager/Scrum MasterAgile SDLCAnalysis of business requirements and system requirementsAzure DevOpsProduct Documentation “Product Analyst” and “Product Management” and (“Power BI” or PowerBI) and Scrum and (Energy or Utility or Electric) and Azure Thanks & Regards,Vikrama RaoRecruitment Executive- ValiantIQ Inc.
